name: SweetHeart
greetingText: You know what! I absolutely love everything about you. Even your kalesh.
wishText: keep smiling like this coz aapke saath ek genius rahega who can absorb all your worries in life!! Bas thoda kamjor dil ka hu daraya kam kroo...
textInChatBox: Happy birthday baby!! Many many happy blah blah...
text3: But you know your man is different
text4: We've done so many crazzy and unique things so wishes should also be
text5Content: You are the most Special thing ever happened to me
outroText: Okay, now come back and tell me if you liked it.
replayText: Or click, if you want to watch it again.
